description: Learn how to make this show-stopping whole roasted cauliflower. It's cheesy, crispy on the outside and deliciously tender on the inside.
name: HoneyRoasted Whole Cauliflower Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fanforced. Grease a large baking tray. Trim base of cauliflower, leaving a few leaves attached. Place cauliflower on tray.
Combine haloumi, prosciutto and oregano in a bowl. Combine oil, zest, lemon juice, honey and garlic in a jug. Season. Add twothirds of the honey mixture to haloumi mixture, stirring to combine.
Using your hands, lightly press haloumi mixture over cauliflower head to secure.
Bake for 1 hour, adding tomatoes and covering halfway with foil, or until cauliflower is cooked through and golden. Drizzle with remaining honey mixture. Scatter spinach over tomato and serve.
